description.value: The weight of authority falls heavily upon you, as well as nearby creatures. All enemies in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] within 60 feet take @Damage[(@actor.level)[spirit]|options:area-damage]{spirit damage damage equal to your level} with a @Check[will|against:exemplar|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC. Any enemy that fails its save must immediately kneel, dropping @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] as a free action.
